__e: Last letter was 8 days ago. "Call Stevie and tell him I'm coming to town, and I still don't know what he wants to do".
I never asked anything about Stevie and now she's not here... there's no-one to ask.
If I could get Stevie in a room and find out what she's done, what she did, if I could do that, I would.
Stevie... you won't take us back to the camp?
And it was Stevie, it wasn't like someone I was...
Well, it wasn't meant to be.
